hangle: 시그렌과 난 어릴 적부터 매일 붙어 다녔고
first_translate: siegren and I have been inseparable since we were young children...

hangle: 우리가 며칠 이상 떨어져 있던 건 이번이 처음이었다.
first_translate: this is the first time that we’ve ever spent more than a few days apart from each other.
is that why he looks different now...?

hangle: 어쩐지 키도 조금 더 큰 것 같고,
first_translate: I think he’s gotten taller too.
and his posture seems better as well.

hangle: 헤어졌을 때보다 시그렌이 좀 더 어른스러워진 느낌이야.
first_translate: it feels like siegren has become even more mature compared to when we parted ways last time.
g-goodness me!
how did they manage to catch such a beast?
that dragon is enormous! I've never seen anything so big before.

hangle: 맨 앞에 말을 탄 청년이 잡은 건가?
first_translate: did the man on horseback at the front capture it?
of course not.
fiona,

hangle: 저게 바로 네게 보여주고 싶었던 거다.
first_translate: this was what I wanted you to see all along.
really?!

hangle: 용 잡아서 보여 주겠다는 게 진담이었어요?!
first_translate: were you serious about slaying dragons for my sake?!

hangle: 당연하지. 아무리 너라도 용은 본 적이 없을 테니,
first_translate: naturally.  I knew you’d never get to see one otherwise.
now take your fill.

hangle: 이런 일을 자꾸 피자 사왔으니 먹어볼래?
first_translate: do you want some pizza? I brought some because--
stop talking down to me!
catching this must have taken quite a bit out of him...
in any case,
the people will remember siegren's face after seeing this spectacle.
the people will remember siegren's face after seeing this spectacle.

hangle: 하루라도 빨리 자리를 잡아야 하는 시그렌에겐
first_translate: for someone like siegren who needs to establish himself quickly,
this isn’t bad publicity at all.
but there’s just one problem here...
but there’s just one problem here...

hangle: 난 이런 장면을 쓴 기억이 없다는 거다.
first_translate: I don’t recall writing this scene anywhere in the story.
there’s something called the butterfly effect.

hangle: 만약 이렇게 내가 예상하지 못한 상황이 계속 일어난다면…
first_translate: if unexpected events continue happening like this,
then how do I stop them from snowballing into bigger problems later on?
then how do I stop them from snowballing into bigger problems later on?
my knowledge of this story could change completely...

hangle: 내가 모르는 전개로 전부 뒤바뀔 수도 있어.
first_translate: ...into developments that are unknown to me.
lady fiona!
lady fiona!!!
you look healthy!
we missed you so much!

hangle: 이 녀석은 아가씨 때문에 울기까지 했다고요!
first_translate: this little guy cried every day while waiting for you!
huh?
they seem to know her pretty well.
looks like she’s popular among the kids.
abel, I’m going home now!
not joining us back at the palace?
no, I’ll walk instead.
shameless!
tsk.
a parade? really?

hangle: 망할 스승이 안 시켰으면 이런 짓 안 했어.
first_translate: I wouldn’t have done this if master hadn’t ordered me to.

hangle: 보나 마나 내가 싫어하는 모습을 보고 즐거워했겠지.
first_translate: I bet he enjoyed watching me squirm through this whole ordeal.

hangle: 이런 걸 할 바엔 다른 걸 하고 싶다고.
first_translate: I wish I didn’t have to waste my time doing things like this.
I would rather spend my time with fiona...
siegren.
fiona...
long time no see.
are you living here for the time being?
I got worried when I couldn’t find you during dinner earlier today.
yep.
it’s really her.
this isn’t a dream anymore.
her hair looks wet.
has it started raining outside already?
I wanna hold her tight.

hangle: 널 다시 보기 위해 어떤 노력을 했는지
first_translate: I wonder if she knows...
...what lengths I went to in order to meet her again.
let go, siegren.

hangle: 아무리 봄이라도 계속 젖은 채로 있으면 감기 걸려.
first_translate: even though it’s springtime, you might still catch a cold if you stay soaked like that.
shouldn’t you dry yourself properly?
ah!
oops.
go sit over there.
just leave it alone. it'll air-dry eventually.
stay put.

hangle: 혼자 두면 또 대충할 거 알아.
first_translate: I know you won’t bother drying off unless I make you.
why can’t you listen to me for once?

hangle: 괜히 내가 매일 따라다닌 게 아니라니까.
first_translate: this is exactly why I had to follow you around everywhere.
geez...
is he trying to act cute or something?
meanwhile, fiona
come to think of it,

hangle: 나 떠나기 전에 말도 안 걸고 그러지 않았나?
first_translate: siegren barely spoke to me right before I left.
is he still mad at me?
wait, aside from being angry,
he also said those words to me...
it does feel kind of awkward thinking about it now.
I hope he forgot about everything by now.
by the way, siegren.
wasn’t catching that dragon difficult?
not particularly.
that’s good.

hangle: 사실 넌 앞으로 그거보다 강한 용과도 더 싸울 예정이란다…
first_translate: to tell you the truth, you’re supposed to fight against stronger dragons soon enough...

hangle: 이야기가 내가 쓴 대로 흘러간다면 말이지.
first_translate: at least according to the original storyline.
okay, that’s it.
you can stand up now...
wait a minute.
oh wow, I'm impressed.

hangle: 그 조그맣던 애가 커서 용을 다 잡다니.
first_translate: can’t believe that tiny kid grew up to hunt dragons.
what’s wrong?
siegren.
I know it’s late,
but great job.
you truly amaze me.

hangle: 헤헷. 그럼 너도 피곤할 텐데 이만…
first_translate: heh. then let’s call it a night since you must be tired t--
hm?
siegren, I need to g--
get going...?
